name: Email Answerer
description: Tool for automatically answering emails by processing their content and responding to them.
author: Shinkai

response_context.description: The context to use when answering emails.

from_date.description: The date from which to start processing emails (inclusive).

to_date.description: The date until which to process emails (exclusive).

table_created.description: Whether the table was created successfully.

mail_ids.description: The IDs of the emails that were processed and answered.

login_status.description: The status of the login process on the imap fetcher.

skipped.description: The IDs of the emails that were skipped.

sqlTables.name: answered_emails
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS answered_emails (email_unique_id TEXT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, subject TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL, response TEXT NOT NULL, received_date DATETIME NOT NULL, response_date DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
